item.title: Fast signup 2
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[text* FULLNAME class:form-control class:fullname placeholder "Fullname"]
[email* EMAIL class:form-control class:email placeholder "E-mail"]
[submit class:btn class:btn-sm class:base_clr_bg class:btn-solid "GO"]
VentcampWP new signup [FULLNAME ] This is an automated email containing the user submitted form data, the same data will be stored in the WordPress Admin Dashboard under "Forms Data" menu tab at the bottom left Fullname: [FULLNAME] E-mail: [EMAIL] -- Have a great day, Vivaco Team. office@example.com Reply-To: [EMAIL] 1 Welcome to StartuplyWP Vivaco Team Dear [FULLNAME], Success! This is an auto-response email that users get on form submit, the form data will be saved in Forms Data section and copy sent to admin email. We are on a mission of making StartuplyWP the most powerful theme for startups out there and would appreciate your thoughts/requests or bugs, just Reply to this email, thanks! Have a great day, Vivaco Team. [EMAIL] Reply-To: office@vivaco.com Your request has been received, thanks! Failed to process your request. Please try later or contact the administrator by another method. Validation errors occurred. Please confirm the fields and submit it again. Failed to process your request. Please try later or contact the administrator by another method. Please accept the terms to proceed. Please fill in the required field. This input is too long. This input is too short. Your entered code is incorrect. Number format seems invalid. This number is too small. This number is too large. Email address seems invalid. URL seems invalid. Telephone number seems invalid. Your answer is not correct. Date format seems invalid. This date is too early. This date is too late. Failed to upload file. This file type is not allowed. This file is too large. Failed to upload file. Error occurred.

item.title: Lead generation 1
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[text* FNAME id:fname placeholder "First name"]
[text* LNAME id:lname placeholder "Last name"]
[email* EMAIL id:email placeholder "E-mail"]
[tel* your-phone id:phone placeholder "+7 123 123 1234"]
[textarea your-message placeholder "Enter your message here"]
[submit class:btn class:btn-lg class:base_clr_bg class:btn-solid "SEND"]
VentcampWP new signup [FULLNAME ] This is an automated email containing the user submitted form data, the same data will be stored in the WordPress Admin Dashboard under "Forms Data" menu tab at the bottom left First name: [FNAME] Last name: [LNAME] E-mail: [EMAIL] Phone: [your-phone] Message: [your-message] -- Have a great day, Vivaco Team. office@example.com Reply-To: [EMAIL] 1 Welcome to StartuplyWP Vivaco Team Dear [FULLNAME], Success! This is an auto-response email that users get on form submit, the form data will be saved in Forms Data section and copy sent to admin email. We are on a mission of making StartuplyWP the most powerful theme for startups out there and would appreciate your thoughts/requests or bugs, just Reply to this email, thanks! Have a great day, Vivaco Team. [EMAIL] Reply-To: office@vivaco.com Your request has been received, thanks! Failed to process your request. Please try later or contact the administrator by another method. Validation errors occurred. Please confirm the fields and submit it again. Failed to process your request. Please try later or contact the administrator by another method. Please accept the terms to proceed. Please fill in the required field. This input is too long. This input is too short. Failed to upload file. Error occurred.

item.title: Fast signup 1
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[text* FULLNAME class:form-control class:name placeholder "Fullname"]
[text* company class:form-control class:fullname placeholder "Company"]
[email* EMAIL class:form-control class:email placeholder "E-mail"]

item.title: Event Registration
item.dc:creator: r007
item.content:encoded:
[text* id:first_name first_name]
[text* id:last_name last_name]
[email* id:email email]

[submit class:btn "submit"]
Test website "[your-subject]" [your-name] From: [your-name] <[your-email]> Subject: [your-subject] Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on VentcampWP event (http://ventcampwp.com/) example@example.com Reply-To: [your-email] Test website "[your-subject]" Test website Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on VentcampWP event (http://ventcampwp.com/) [your-email] Reply-To: example@example.com Thank you for your message. It has been sent. There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later. One or more fields have an error. Please check and try again. There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later. You must accept the terms and conditions before sending your message. The field is required. The field is too long. The field is too short. The date format is incorrect. The date is before the earliest one allowed. The date is after the latest one allowed. There was an unknown error uploading the file. You are not allowed to upload files of this type. The file is too big. There was an error uploading the file. The number format is invalid. The number is smaller than the minimum allowed. The number is larger than the maximum allowed. The answer to the quiz is incorrect. Your entered code is incorrect. The e-mail address entered is invalid. The URL is invalid. The telephone number is invalid.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
[text* id:first_name first_name]
[text* id:last_name last_name]
[email* id:email email]

[submit class:btn "submit"]
